predicate.note: Frames file for 'ebb' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Although viewership soars when big news breaks, it ebbs during periods of calm.

example.name: with awkward modifier
example.text: Mr. Greenberg, noting that stock-index arbitrage rises and ebbs with stock market's volatility, said...
